turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, would you mind ordering me some Starbucks for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, Starbucks on Main Street?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm heading to Division Street. The cloest one near there is okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Found one on Division Street. What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A Frappuccino will be nice. What do you recommend.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: If a Frappuccino is what you're looking for. I recommend a Caramel Frappuccino. Does that sound good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, give me 2 other recommendations.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The Java Chip Frappuccino and the Juniper Frappuccino are pretty popular. How about those?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I can't decide, but I like both of them. Order both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay 1 Juniper Frappuccino and 1 Java Chip Frappuccino. What sizes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both tall please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay 1 Tall Java Chip Frappuccino and 1 Tall Juniper Frappuccino. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, add in a cookie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I added a cookie into your order, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes extra ice please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: On both drinks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, added extra add into your order. 1 Tall Juniper Frappuccino with extra ice. 1 Tall Java Chip Frappuccino with extra ice and a cookie. Is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, send the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Gotta cha. Order sent. It will be ready for pickup shortly and that your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem, please let me know if you need anything else.
